title: Citi Poland Named Best Service Center in Central and Eastern Europe
summary: Warsaw - Winners of the competition for "best companies in the process outsourcing and shared services sectors" have been announced at the CEE Outsourcing and Shared Services Awards Gala. The award for the best shared service center in the CEE (Central and Eastern Europe) region in 2013 went to Citi Service Center in Poland.
tag-1: Citi Poland Named Best Service Center in Central and Eastern Europe
tag-2: Warsaw – Winners of the competition for "best companies in the process outsourcing and shared services sectors" have been announced at the CEE Outsourcing and Shared Services Awards Gala. The award for the best shared service center in the CEE (Central and Eastern Europe) region in 2013 went to Citi Service Center in Poland.
tag-3: "It is a great distinction for us, which again confirms the growing importance of business services in Poland," says Terri Gerosa, Head of Citi Service Center Poland. "The high quality of services offered by Polish experts has brought a steady stream of companies to this region of Europe. Also, Citi Service Center Poland is now becoming one of the key points on the Citi world map. Our Poland team provides services to Citi customers from 60 countries all over the globe.
tag-4: "We have been operating in the Polish market since 2005, and our business is growing very fast. The scale of our operations is demonstrated by the fact that we are currently providing more than 100 diverse and increasingly complex services to support Citi's global corporate and consumer businesses," adds Terri.
tag-5: Citi Service Center Poland has more than 2,400 employees holding the positions of analysts, experts and managers. The main business areas of the company include: anti-money laundering operations, banking, securities and investment funds' operations, multiple control functions, and providing service and support for Citi's global technology infrastructure.
tag-6: The winners of CEE Outsourcing and Shared Services Award were selected from among 140 nominees. A panel composed of representatives of the business services sector operating in CEE chose the winners. The awards were granted in three categories: Cities, Companies and Human Resources.
tag-7: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
